name: 100 Funny Cats
description:
🤡🎪🐾 WELCOME TO 100 FUNNY CATS – THE BEST HIDDEN OBJECTS GAME! 🤣🎈

Join the cutest adventure in the Funny world full of cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of circus themed locations as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.
Test your attention and observation skills in this cozy and delightful hidden object game.
Each cat is more charming than the last, and every discovery brings a smile to your face.

🐈🕵️‍♂️ Can you find them all? 🕵️‍♂️🐈

⚙️ Key Features ⚙️

  • 🎮 1 Level
  • 🐈 100 Hidden Cats
  • 🎮 1 Extra Level
  • 🐈 100 Extra Hidden Cats
  • 🎵 Awesome Soundtrack
  • 🎨 High Quality Resolution Artworks
  • 🌗 Brightness Settings
  • 💾 Progress Saves
  • 🔍 Zoom
  • 😺 Real Meow Sounds!
  • 💥 Combo Counter!
  • 💡 Hints
  • 🌐 No Text

🏆 START YOUR AMAZING JOURNEY IN THE WORLD OF CATS RIGHT NOW 🏆

Don't miss out on the cutest and exciting puzzle game ever! Come to 100 Funny Cats and start your amazing adventure today!
